H0.text: The cost of the land is the most important environmental consideration when a community plans to locate a new sanitary landfill.

H1.text: The location of the groundwater is the most important environmental consideration when a community plans to build a new sanitary landfill.

H2.text: The proximity to an industrial park is the most important environmental consideration when locating a new sanitary landfill for your community.

H3.text: The accessibility to a major highway is the most important environmental consideration when locating a new sanitary landfill in your community.

A4.text: the ground around landfills must be tested for leachate to prevent pollutants from contaminating groundwater
